name: CarpHero
description:
Introduction

This game was created in 7 days for Mar Del Jam 2021.

It is a fast-paced delivery game placed on a beach from Mar del Plata.

Web build is missing water for now because of shader compatibilty on WebGL so we encourage you to download Windows executable instead. Besides if you want to play it on browser you should maximize it.

How To Play

Movement -> WASD or arrow keys

Pick Object -> Left Click when you are close enough to an item that you are facing. Besides you should take into account that you can carry up to three items at the same time.

Drop Object -> Right Click when you are holding at least one item.

Credits

-Valentino Accattoli | Music, SFX and Game Design

-Ray N. | 2D/3D Art

-JPCard | Programming and Game Design

-Maxi Perez | 2D/3D Art

-Admix | Programming

-Nicolas La Gioia | Game Design

Special thanks to Franco Biagioli for all the useful tips.

Finally, thanks for taking time to read this and we hope you enjoy the game. Feel free to make comments about the game.
